title: Code Runner
description: Code runner was my final project carried out in the last year of my high school integrated with software development. A platform where there are programming challenges, in which the user can solve them and see the result in real time.

title: Dashboard - Stock Control
description: A dashboard for stock control, where the user can add, remove, and view products in stock.

title: React Kanban
description: An application of Kanban board developed with React, where the user has tasks of low, medium, and high priority.

title: Personal Finances
description: An application to manage personal finances, allowing the user to add income and expenses.

title: Calculator
description: A simple calculator developed with Javascript.
